# TagProvider.AsReadOnly method

Creates a version of the provider which is read-only. If the current version of the provider is not read-only, further modifications will be reflected in the read-only version.

```csharp
public TagProvider AsReadOnly()
```

## Return Value

A read-only version of the current tag provider.
